titles.title: SNAP Education Allocation Modernization Act of 2023
SNAP Education Allocation Modernization Act of 2023

A bill to amend the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 to modify the allocation of funding to States for the nutrition education and obesity prevention grant program under the supplemental nutrition assistance program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.
